application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1. Bay TreeRear Garden (Extreme Rear Boundary)Current Tree height 8m and crown spread 7m After proposed works= (Tree Height 6m and crown spread 5m). Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 2 metres.T2 Buddleia/YewRear Garden (North Boundary)Current Tree height 4m and crown spread 2mFell and Grind out stumps.3 Holly/YewRear Garden (South Boundary)Current of Holly Tree height 9m and crown spread 4m After proposed works= (Tree Height 7m and crown spread 3m). Reduce height of Holly by 2m and reduce spread by 1m.Current of Yew Tree height 7m and crown spread 4m After proposed works= (Tree Height 6m and crown spread 3m). Reduce height of Yew by 2m and reduce spread by 1m.4 Euonymus/YewRear Garden (South Boundary)Current of Yew/Euonymus Tree height 6m and crown spread 4m After proposed works= (Tree Height 5m and crown spread 3m). Trim height and spread by 1m to a rounded form.5 PyracanthaRear Garden:Current Tree height 4m and crown spread 2mFell and grind out stump.6 LaurelRear Garden:Fell and grind out stump.Current Tree height 5m and crown spread 3m7 ViburnumRear Garden:Current Tree height 4m and crown spread 2mFell and grind out stump.
